example.code:
PS C:\> $ec2TagFilter = New-Object Amazon.CodeDeploy.Model.EC2TagFilter PS C:\> $ec2TagFilter.Key = "Name" PS C:\> $ec2TagFilter.Type = [Amazon.CodeDeploy.EC2TagFilterType]::KEY_AND_VALUE PS C:\> $ec2TagFilter.Value = "CodeDeployDemo" PS C:\> New-CDDeploymentGroup -ApplicationName MyNewApplication -AutoScalingGroup CodeDeployDemo-ASG -DeploymentConfigName CodeDeployDefault.OneAtATime -DeploymentGroupName MyNewDeploymentGroup -Ec2TagFilter $ec2TagFilter -ServiceRoleArn arn:aws:iam::80398EXAMPLE:role/CodeDeployDemo
16bbf199-95fd-40fc-a909-0bbcfEXAMPLE
example.description: This example creates a deployment group with the specified name, Auto Scaling group, deployment configuration, tag, and service role, for the specified application.
